text: :question:  Is it possible to set up a redirection from a .pdf file in HubSpot to a website?
You just have to use the site domain version of the pdf to forward from
<@U38EZFVFE> Well, this is what I get :slightly_smiling_face:

does HS support browser-based push notification when a blog post is published? I’m looking at this article <https://blog.HubSpot.com/marketing/push-notification-types> and see there’s some recommended services, but no discussion on whether they integrate or support blog. i don’t see those services in the integrations marketplace.
Let me look into this for you, I don’t believe HS has anything natively to do this but ill check into it

<@UBUNBSM24> Thank you for the info! It was helpful and got me on the right track. However, "|title" is not what was being used. It was "|capitalize"... like this:

`<h1>Filtered by Topic: <span class="capital-case">'{{tag|replace('-', ' ')|capitalize }}'</span></h1>`

What is the filter that makes the format be left alone? I tried removing it completely and the tag doesn't display.
